name: beast-ball
effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon.  If the wild Pokémon is an Ultra Beast, this ball has a catch rate of 5×.  Otherwise, it has a catch rate of 0.1×.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 5× for Ultra Beasts and 0.1× for all other Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A special Poké Ball designed to catch Ultra Beasts.
It has a low success rate for catching others.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
A special Poké Ball designed to catch Ultra Beasts.
It has a low success rate for catching others.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
A special Poké Ball designed to catch Ultra Beasts.
It has a low success rate for catching others.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that has a low success
rate for catching a Pokémon.
